name: Terms And Conditions (Kuna!, KaisoshA, Conner Vincent, Alex McKay, xenodryl)
name_original: Terms And Conditions (Kuna!, KaisoshA, Conner Vincent, Alex McKay, xenodryl)
description:
Set in the Y2K era, play the role of a naïve child in their early exposure to the internet, having snuck onto the family computer late at night to play a suspicious online game. Skim past lame walls of text and install cool software in an endless web-surfing experience before the parental controls take action.

Credits

Kuna! - Programmer, Level Designer

NoDubstepHere - Environment Artist, Prop Artist

Xenotronica - Art Director, Concept Artist, UI Artist

Dexerra - Audio Designer

KaisoshA - Prop Artist, Animator
